title: Research progress on thermo-hydraulic characteristics and optimization of PCHEs for high temperature-pressure applications
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00257A, Review Article
Vivek Kumar Pandey, Pramod Kumar
The article presents an extensive survey on the thermo-hydraulic characteristics and optimization strategies of printed circuit heat exchangers (PCHEs), tailored for high-temperature and high-pressure applications like nuclear systems and supercritical...
